mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Image of the Different Versions of The Doctor

mods:mods.mods:abstract: In this image, the different versions of the Doctor, as portrayed by the series leads, are displayed in chronological order. They appear left to right from top row: William Hartnell (1963-1966), Patrick Troughton (1966-1969), Jon Pertwee (1970-1974), Tom Baker (1974-1981), Peter Davidson (1982-1984), Colin Baker (1984-1986), Paul McGann (1996), Christopher Eccleston (2005), David Tennant (2005-2010), Matt Smith (2010-2013), and Peter Capaldi (2014-present). Many other actors have played the title character of The Doctor on television and in various BBC-licensed spin-offs on television, stage, radio, film, audio plays and webcasts. The character's ability to periodically regenerate his appearance and personality has facilitated the ability of new actors to take over the role – in both official and unofficial productions – while in most cases maintaining continuity with the television series.

pbcore:pbcoreDescriptionDocument.pbcore:pbcoreTitle: Image of the Different Versions of the Doctor
pbcore:pbcoreDescriptionDocument.pbcore:pbcoreDescription: In this image, the different versions of the Doctor, as portrayed by the series leads, are displayed in chronological order. They appear left to right from top row: William Hartnell (1963-1966), Patrick Troughton (1966-1969), Jon Pertwee (1970-1974), Tom Baker (1974-1981), Peter Davidson (1982-1984), Colin Baker (1984-1986), Paul McGann (1996), Christopher Eccleston (2005), David Tennant (2005-2010), Matt Smith (2010-2013), and Peter Capaldi (2014-present). Many other actors have played the title character of The Doctor on television and in various BBC-licensed spin-offs on television, stage, radio, film, audio plays and webcasts. The character's ability to periodically regenerate his appearance and personality has facilitated the ability of new actors to take over the role – in both official and unofficial productions – while in most cases maintaining continuity with the television series.
